topic.title: Could one of you crypto kids give me some advice?
topic.body: Is there a crypto coin that has an offical wallet with a built in system like steemit except where people post news and information. That news and information is ranked and rewarded with the crypto coin.

1618878945_1FS7cWbFfDHBxfTJSWmko38NU2iSq.body: I ill pay my taxes to the country that protects me.
